title: Taken by the Alpha
description:
Perfectly broken...



Perfectly gorgeous...



Perfect to ruin...


Lucy came to assassinate me, now I must punish her!


Iâ€™ve come too far...



Plotted too long...


Lost too much, to let one omega sweep in and upset all my plans. She thinks she can redeem me...? Not I plan to live up to my reputation as a monster, who breaks everything that comes his way...


Starting with her...
author: Laxmi Hariharan
